title: Silk Road chutney
description: Travel the length of the ancient Silk Road spice trail with the flavours of this fragrant tomato chutney, perfect with cheeses and cold meats.
ingredients: 1 thumb-sized piece fresh root ginger, finely chopped
1 chipotle chilli, soaked in warm water, drained
1 corn-on-the-cob, kernels removed (or handful frozen sweetcorn kernels, thawed)
2 chunks Chinese rock sugar (available from specialist Asian grocers)
freshly squeezed juice from 2-3 tomatoes, sieved
